name: robotii's adventure! (beta 1.2.0)
description:
robotii must go on an adventure to save his beloved friend, marshi, that has been captured by evil robotii's toys! if robotii does not make it in time, evil robotii's toys will, soon enough, take over the world!

a, and d to move left and right. k to jump. (you can customize these keybinds in the settings menu!) press a direction and jump against a wall to wall slide. jump while doing this to wall jump.

robotii is made by me. (aka https://youtube.com/@triplelllgaming) and marshi is made by my friend. (aka https://youtube.com/@marshirebooted)
